item.title: Ken Cross
item.description: This is a test for now… I am a software engineer by trade with professional interests that span mathematics and physics. As a computer scientist, the things that truly peak my interest are language and compiler design, distributed systems, and operating systems.

item.title: Abstractions
item.description: The correct abstractions in programming are hard to make for the future case. Often, not enough data is given at the start or the product changes in such a way that is no long flexible with the current line of thought. So, how then, should we build programs in a sustainable way?
